reviews.review_msg: Really good professor. Don't be so confident. This course you must pay a lot of attention in order to get a good grade, even if you are a genius. Don't blame the professor if you did not get a good grade. You get a low grade shows you should not learn actuarial science, or you did not work hard enough.

If you want to get into SOA you don't need to take Actuarial Sciences courses in university. You can learn what they teach by taking math and finance courses and they won't hurt your GPA. Gary can't teach wrong prof for this class. Don't get the textbooks use his lecture notes and the internet to find what you need.
Very helpful prof. Tests are very hard, but that's what you get if you want to get into ACMA. You need to put in a lot of effort and do a lot of supplementary exercises. Overall, very good prof.
